title: Draft Board Meeting Minutes
description: A corporate paralegal needs to draft the official minutes for a recent board of directors meeting.

tasks.description: Review the recording or transcript of the board meeting.
Identify all formal motions, votes, and official actions taken during the meeting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts all key decisions and votes.

tasks.description: Draft the minutes in a formal, structured format, including the date, attendees, and a summary of the actions taken.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a set of draft minutes that accurately reflect the meeting.
